name: Pathnumber
description:
Pathnumber

Welcome to pathnumber, in this game you must solve puzzles to advance through the different levels. Each level contains one or more 3x3 grids with a number in the middle. You juste have to fill in the grids so that when you reach the end, each grid contains the number in the middle.

More level soon.

version change

v0.0.4 : add 30 levels, fixe level 16 position, fixe level 47 and force orientation on landscape on Android

v0.0.3 : add pause menu and fixe level 42

v0.0.2 : add 10 levels and text version bug fixe

v0.0.1 : initial commit
